metadata.name: CryptoBubble #1
metadata.description:
***LAUNCH EVENT: Bidding event for the tokens #1, #2 and #3***
 • The highest bidder wins the NFT and receives an ETH airdrop
 • ETH airdrop: 0.1 ETH or the total revenue from the 2nd and 3rd highest-priced auction NFTs (whichever is higher)
 • Making an offer guarantees you a whitelist spot
 • Successful bidders will receive the Bubble Blower membership

FLIP/HODL this NFT token while holding the whitelist (WL) allows you to become an exclusive member of the Bubble Blower community. As a Bubble Blower, you gain access to weekly bidding events where you can acquire special edition NFTs and receive a massive ETH airdrop directly into your bidding wallet. Additionally, token holders will enjoy benefits during upcoming phases.

All supplies of this NFT token are managed by our AI robot, which makes decisions based on your actions: FLIP or HODL. Leveraging your trading activity data, the AI robot automatically regulates the listing price and timing of new release NFTs, aiming to prevent extreme price fluctuations, ensure a gradual yet consistent price increase and maintain a steady supply. Rest assured, our AI-powered system is designed to optimize your trading experience and promote a stable marketplace.
